text: Inside the Vainshtein radius; see also :r_V = l_\text{P}\left( \frac{m_\text{P}^3M}{m^4_G} \right)^\frac{1}{5} :with Planck length l_\text{P} and Planck mass m_\text{P} the gravitational field around a body of mass M is the same in a theory where the graviton mass m_G is zero and where it's very small because the helicity 0 degree of freedom becomes effective on distance scales r \gg r_V. == References == Category:Quantum gravity
title: Vainshtein radius
